title: Alex Padilla - Wikipedia
snippet: In April 2025, Padilla introduced the Fix Our Forests Act alongside Senators John Hickenlooper, John Curtis, and Tim Sheehy. The bill aims to improve forest management for wildfire risk reduction. Padilla supports ending the Senate filibuster. Padilla supports immigrants' rights.

title: Alex Padilla | Congress.gov | Library of Congress
snippet: Sponsor: Padilla, Alex [Sen.-D-CA] (Introduced 12/11/2025) Cosponsors: (1) Committees: Senate - Energy and Natural Resources Latest Action: Senate - 12/11/2025 Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

title: Alex Padilla - Ballotpedia
snippet: Padilla also ran in a special election to the U.S. Senate to represent California. He won in the special general election on November 8, 2022. ... Alex Padilla earned a B.S.

title: Alex Padilla Won’t Run for Governor, Commits to U.S. Senate Role
snippet: .@SenAlexPadilla (D-CA) announces he will not run for governor next year: "I choose not just to stay in the Senate; I choose to stay in this fight." pic.twitter.com/RGmPFnHxkc— CSPAN (@cspan) November 4, 2025
